name: Cameron Yick

experience.title: Software Engineer @ Metamarkets
experience.detail: Built internal profiling tools, and implemented performance optimizations for a petabyte-scale interactive visual data analysis web application.

experience.title: Data Analyst @ Yale Data-Driven Environmental Solutions Group
experience.detail: Data scraping, munging, analysis, and visualization to assist environmental policy researchers for various data journalism projects and policy reports for group clients.

experience.title: Web Developer for Math as a Second Language
experience.detail: Built custom CMS for a math nonprofit to share resources, maintainable using a spreadsheet interface.

bio: I'm curious about how play can be incorporated into our daily experiences through good design. I'm interested in using interactive data visualization to make data-driven decision making accessible to broader audiences, as well as using game design/psychology to promote greener cities and healthier living habits. I'm also a contributor to the swimmingscience.net blog, and a regular tosser of frisbees.
smallBio: I like cleaning up pie charts and doodling with code.
